allowedParameters.name: total
allowedParameters.description: The total number of location items.

allowedParameters.name: offset
allowedParameters.description: Index of the first location item to return. The default is 0.

allowedParameters.name: limit
allowedParameters.description: The number of location items to return. The default is 10.

allowedParameters.name: sort
allowedParameters.description:
The location items sorting criteria. Following are the fields supported by this param: 

|Field|Type|Description|
|------------------|------------------|------------------|
|property|string|The property by which to sort the list of location items.  The default is locationId.|
|order|string|The sort order, either 'asc' (ascending) or 'desc' (decending).  The default is 'asc'.|
